title: Fix auto-deployment
body_html:
After this build https://travis-ci.org/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/builds/21379927 I have just found the application returning 500.

I have heroku run rake db:migrate -rproduction && heroku restart -rproduction, which brought it back.

Not sure why the auto deployment doesn't do that itself, but I guess we should fix that.
body_text:

body:
After this build https://travis-ci.org/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/builds/21379927 I have just found the application returning 500.

I have `heroku run rake db:migrate -rproduction && heroku restart -rproduction`, which brought it back.

Not sure why the auto deployment doesn't do that itself, but I guess we should fix that.
